CommentRequireEmptyHands: If true main and offhand must be empty to use grab/hang.
CommentLeapSideSpeed: Impulse for side and backwards leaps while hanging.
CommentLeapUpSpeed: Impulse for upward leaps while hanging.
CommentLateralSpeed: Lateral slide speed along the ledge while hanging.
CommentGrabActionLockSec: Cooldown for perfoming actions after grabbing ledge.
